[mother] When you were born,

translation.de: Ich bin egoistisch? Mama, Baba und Shahed sind in meinem Herzen.

translation.en: I keep thinking about them. But you don't, you just carry on.
translation.de: Ich denke ständig an sie! Du nicht. Du machst einfach weiter.

translation.en: You're reckless. They're in danger now because of you.
translation.de: Du bist leichtsinnig. Sie sind wegen dir in Gefahr.

translation.en: -You can talk. -What?
translation.de: Du redest nur viel. -Was? -Wenigstens habe ich ein Ziel.

translation.en: At least I have a goal.
What are you doing here? You try to be cool and waste your time partying.
translation.de: Du versuchst, cool zu sein, und verschwendest deine Zeit mit Partys.

translation.en: I don't know you anymore. You're not swimming. You're not doing anything.
translation.de: Ich erkenne dich kaum wieder. Du schwimmst nicht mehr.

translation.en: You're never going to achieve anything.
[Sven in English] Right, OK.
You missed the second turn.
translation.de: Du hast die zweite Wende verpasst und warst zu langsam.

translation.en: Your frequency was too slow in the last 25 meters. What's wrong?
translation.de: Du hast die zweite Wende verpasst und warst zu langsam. -Was ist los? -Nichts.

translation.en: Nothing.
-Sure? -Yes.
OK. I wanted to tell you later,
translation.de: Ok, ich wollte es dir später sagen,

translation.en: but I have something that will make you smile.
translation.de: aber ich hab was, das dich zum Lächeln bringt.

translation.en: What?
I heard the International Olympic Committee gave a press conference, and they were announcing help for refugee athletes.
translation.de: Das Internationale Olympische Komitee will Flüchtlingssportlern helfen.

translation.en: They're forming a refugee team for Rio.
translation.de: Sie stellen ein Flüchtlingsteam für Rio zusammen.

translation.en: OK.
I sent them your times and told them about your swim across the sea,
translation.de: Ich schickte ihnen deine Zeiten und erzählte von eurer Überfahrt.

translation.en: and, hey, if we work hard and your times improve,
translation.de: Wenn wir hart arbeiten und deine Zeiten besser werden,

translation.en: you can get onto the team.
What?
If you had the chance, would you want to compete
because you were good enough or because people felt sorry for you?
translation.de: weil du gut genug bist oder weil man dich bemitleidet?

translation.en: I want to go to the Olympics more than anything.
translation.de: Ich will mehr als alles andere zur Olympiade.

translation.en: But when I go, I will be there swimming for my country.
translation.de: Aber wenn ich es schaffe, werde ich für mein Land schwimmen.

translation.en: [Yusra] I'm sorry. About what I said last night.
translation.de: Es tut mir leid, was ich gestern gesagt habe.

translation.en: You meant it.
Not in the way I said it.
You're so soft on the outside. So hard underneath.
translation.de: Du bist außen so weich und innen so hart.

translation.en: But I kind of admire this about you.
I'm so happy you're swimming.
translation.de: Ich bin froh, dass du schwimmst.

translation.en: Sven called, by the way.
About the refugee team.
You should do it.
This was everything you ever wanted.
translation.de: Das ist alles, was du je wolltest.

translation.en: Not in the way I want it.
Yeah, but nothing has been the way we wanted it.
translation.de: Ja, aber nichts lief so, wie wir es wollten.

translation.en: Why would this be any different?
I want to swim for Syria.
No.
That's what Baba wanted.
Baba ever tell you why he stopped swimming for Syria?
translation.de: Weißt du, warum er aufhörte, für Syrien zu schwimmen?

translation.en: Military service.
He was actually very good.
At the beginning, I thought it was an excuse, but it wasn't.
translation.de: Anfangs hielt ich es für eine Ausrede.

translation.en: And he had to lose two years of training just to carry a gun.
translation.de: Er musste zwei Jahre Training wegwerfen, nur um ein Gewehr zu tragen.

translation.en: Life is not fair.
I'm Sara Mardini.
I have no country anymore.
This might be the only opportunity of your life.
translation.de: Das könnte die einzige Chance deines Lebens sein.

translation.en: Look at me.
Don't be stupid. Take it.
Oh, I was looking for you.
I wanted to go to the Olympics for Team Syria,
translation.de: Ich wollte mit Team Syrien zur Olympiade.

translation.en: but if I can't, I'd like to swim for Team Sven.
translation.de: Aber ich schwimme auch gern für Team Sven.

translation.en: If you still want me to, even though I'm stupid, and I don't deserve it.
translation.de: Wenn du mich noch willst, obwohl ich dumm bin und es nicht verdiene.

translation.en: For 2020, we will train for Syria, but for 2016, I'm Team Refugee.
translation.de: Für 2020 trainieren wir für Syrien, aber für 2016 bin ich im Flüchtlingsteam.

translation.en: We have a lot of work to do.
Ready?
[Ezzat in Arabic] Tell me about your training.
[Yusra] Of course, Baba.
[Ezzat] I want you to describe every detail.
The feeling underwater.
Every stroke, every move you make.
[in English] I want to know what this German has done.
translation.de: Ich will wissen, was dieser Deutsche tut.

translation.en: That was kind of "flop-flop." No, you have to…
translation.de: Das war so "plumps-plumps". Du musst aber…

translation.en: The head is too high. Focus on the elbow. OK?
translation.de: Der Kopf ist zu hoch. Konzentriere dich auf den Ellbogen. Ok?

translation.en: What was my time?
What was my time?
-We're going to Rio. -No.
-We're going to Rio. -We're going to Rio?
We're going to Rio!
-Hey! We are going to Rio! -[Yusra screams]
But I can't stop thinking about them.
translation.de: Ich kann nicht aufhören, an sie zu denken.

translation.en: I saw on Facebook that 100,000 people
had to cross the sea to Greece in the last two months.
translation.de: in den letzten zwei Monaten übers Meer nach Griechenland.

translation.en: You know, what we've been through isn't special.
translation.de: Was wir erlebten, ist nichts Besonderes.

translation.en: Well…
What I saw on Facebook was this place in Sonnenallee
translation.de: Laut Facebook gibt es in der Sonnenallee einen Laden

translation.en: run by this guy from Damascus.
He makes the same whipped ice cream that he made back there.
translation.de: Er macht das gleiche Eis, das er dort gemacht hat.

translation.en: We should try it.
[mother in Arabic] An Olympian, my own daughter.
An Olympian, I don't believe it. All that time at the poolside wasn't for nothing.
translation.de: -Olympionikin, nicht zu fassen. -Die Zeit am Beckenrand war nicht umsonst.

translation.en: It's good. It's as it should be.
translation.de: Es ist so, wie es sein sollte.

translation.en: And Sara? You didn't have the times?
translation.de: Und Sara? Deine Zeiten reichten nicht?

translation.en: Even for this refugee team?
No, Baba. I didn't.
"Refugee team"? You say it like it doesn't count.
translation.de: Du sagst "Flüchtlingsteam", als ob es nicht zählt.

translation.en: Nice tracksuit.
-[Yusra] What have you done? -It's good at the back?
translation.de: -Was hast du getan? -Ist es hinten gut?

translation.en: [Yusra] It's beautiful.
[Sara] I always wanted it short.
I wanna tell you something.
I've decided…
I'm going back to Lesbos.
[in Arabic] What?
[in English] I found this organization, and I've been emailing them,
translation.de: Es gibt eine Organisation, mit der ich maile.

translation.en: and they help everyone who's crossing.
-I want to be part of this. -No, Sara, please.
translation.de: -Ich will mich da einbringen. -Nein, Sara, bitte.

translation.en: We need to move on, go forward.
-What are you doing? -I need to be there. To help everyone.
translation.de: -Was soll das? -Ich muss dort sein und anderen helfen.

translation.en: Give them water, shoes, everything we didn't have.
translation.de: Ihnen Wasser geben, Schuhe, alles, was wir nicht hatten.

translation.en: You know, Mama, Shahed, Baba will come the same way, maybe.
translation.de: Mama, Shahed, Baba kommen vielleicht auf diese Weise.

translation.en: So you won't come with me to Rio?
translation.de: Du kommst also nicht mit mir nach Rio?

translation.en: Look, you were right. I've never done anything with my life.
translation.de: Du hattest recht. Ich habe nichts im Leben erreicht.

translation.en: This is the first time I feel this.
translation.de: Zum ersten Mal spüre ich das auch.

translation.en: Look, you can move on.
You can become an Olympian.
I can't.
This is the right thing for me.
translation.de: Das ist das Richtige für mich.

translation.en: [Nizar] What's this? [Yusra] I was going to wait for your birthday.
translation.de: -Was ist das? -Ich wollte auf deinen Geburtstag warten.

translation.en: Happy early birthday! [chuckles]
You remembered my birthday?
You're not allowed to give up.
-Thank you. -No, thank you.
Maybe you are my favorite cousin.
I don't believe you. You said this to Sara last week, so…
translation.de: Letzte Woche hast du das zu Sara gesagt.

translation.en: I think I'll get going. I'll leave you prepare your stuff.
translation.de: Ich gehe jetzt, damit du dich vorbereiten kannst.

translation.en: [in Arabic] Uh… You've made us walk taller.
Don't worry about winning.
I am so proud of you.
Peace.
[in English] Bye.
[woman on PA] Next stop, the Olympic Village.
[man in English] Welcome to Rio de Janeiro.
11,238 athletes from 207 nations
gathering to take part in the Games of the 31st Olympiad,
translation.de: sind für die 31. Olympischen Spiele zusammengekommen,

translation.en: the greatest sporting spectacle in the world.
[Yusra] Thank you.
-What's that? -I don't know!
[man] But one new team has been generating a special buzz.
translation.de: Aber ein neues Team sorgt für viel Gesprächsstoff.

translation.en: The Refugee Olympic Team.
-So, Yusra, welcome to Rio. -Thank you.
-Oh my God, that's David Rudisha. -Who?
Don't you know anybody?
I've been swimming since I was a kid.
[man on PA] Welcome to the world-famous Maracanã Stadium
in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, for the opening ceremony.
translation.de: in Rio de Janeiro, wo die Eröffnungsfeier stattfindet.

translation.en: [woman on PA] They have traveled from all corners of the earth
translation.de: Sie sind aus allen Ecken der Welt angereist

translation.en: and have spent a lifetime training for this moment.
translation.de: und haben ihr Leben lang für diesen Moment trainiert.

translation.en: Ladies and gentlemen, the great moment has arrived.
translation.de: Meine Damen und Herren, jetzt ist der große Moment gekommen.

translation.en: [announcer] We welcome the Refugee Olympic Team.
translation.de: Wir begrüßen das Refugee Olympic Team.

translation.en: [man on PA] A journey that has taken the flame all the way from Greece to Rio.
translation.de: Eine Reise, die die Fackel von Griechenland nach Rio geführt hat.

translation.en: [all chanting] Refugees!
[screams] Sara!
I want to know, for everyone out there, what's been your main motivation…
translation.de: Eine Frage, die alle interessiert: Was war deine Hauptmotivation…

translation.en: [girl 1] That's the Syrian girl that's racing today.
translation.de: Das ist die Syrerin, die heute startet.

translation.en: [girl 2] I mean, I'm all for charity, but…
translation.de: Ich bin sehr für Wohltätigkeit, aber…

translation.en: [girl 1] Exactly. The rest of us had to work to be here.
translation.de: Genau, wir mussten hart arbeiten, um hier zu sein.

translation.en: [Yusra on TV] Yeah, it's such an honor to be part of it.
translation.de: Es ist so eine Ehre, dabei zu sein.

translation.en: It's a chance to be a voice and to give hope.
translation.de: Es gibt mir die Chance, anderen Hoffnung zu machen.

translation.en: Hi. [Sara] So, aren't you about to swim your race?
-Yes. -What are you doing sitting on your ass?
How do you--
[Yusra screeches] I can't believe you're here!
This is crazy!
Sister.
How did you get here?
I contacted the sponsor of the refugee team,
translation.de: Ich sagte dem Sponsor des Flüchtlingsteams,

translation.en: and I told them that I was the sister of the world-famous Yusra Mardini.
translation.de: ich sei die Schwester der weltberühmten Yusra Mardini.

translation.en: -And I even flew business class. -What?!
-We were in economy. -I don't fly economy, habibi.
-And what about Lesbos? -I'm gonna go straight after.
translation.de: -Und was ist mit Lesbos? -Da fliege ich gleich danach hin.

translation.en: I wanna show you something.
[in Arabic] Good luck, my love. I'm not worried because you're lucky.
translation.de: Ich mache mir keine Sorgen, weil du ein Glückskind bist.

translation.en: Luck has nothing to do with it. Remember everything I've taught you.
translation.de: Glück hat damit nichts zu tun. Denk an meinen Unterricht.

translation.en: Yalla, Shahed. I hope you win.
[in English] Good luck, Yusra. We love you. We miss you.
translation.de: Viel Glück, Yusra. Wir lieben dich. Wir vermissen dich.

translation.en: So grown-up!
[Shada] Good luck.
[Sara] Actually, I didn't really wanna show you this one.
translation.de: -Das wollte ich dir gar nicht zeigen. -Warum?

translation.en: [Yusra] Why? Is she back in Eritrea?
Is she safe?
I heard other swimmers talking.
They said I shouldn't be here.
translation.de: Sie finden, ich sollte nicht hier sein.

translation.en: They said I don't deserve it.
translation.de: Sie sagten, ich verdiene es nicht.

translation.en: Well, they're right. You shouldn't.
translation.de: Sie haben recht. Das solltest du nicht.

translation.en: You should be at the bottom of the Greek sea.
translation.de: Du solltest im Meer ertrunken sein.

translation.en: Or sleeping on the roadside of Hungaria.
translation.de: Oder in Hungaria am Straßenrand schlafen.

translation.en: Or you should be dead in a hole in Dariyya.
translation.de: Oder tot in einem Loch in Dariyya liegen.

translation.en: I just wanna be a swimmer.
You know Olympians are people who are supposed to do amazing things.
Don't do that.
Remember what Baba used to say?
translation.de: Weißt du noch, was Baba sagte?

translation.en: "Find your lane. Swim your race."
It's all bullshit.
[man on PA] Please welcome the athletes in heat one of the women's 100m butterfly.
translation.de: Begrüßen Sie die Teilnehmerinnen des ersten Laufs über 100 m Schmetterling.

translation.en: [Sara] You should swim for all of us.
translation.de: Du solltest für uns alle schwimmen.

translation.en: [Sara] You should swim for Baba because he didn't.
translation.de: Schwimm für Baba, weil er es nicht tat.

translation.en: Swim for me because I couldn't.
translation.de: Schwimm für mich, weil ich es nicht konnte.

translation.en: Swim for Sven because he couldn't.
translation.de: Schwimm für Sven, weil er es nicht konnte.

translation.en: Swim for Shada.
Swim for Razan Haddad.
[man on PA] Swimming for Qatar in lane two, Nada Arakji.
translation.de: Für Katar startet auf Bahn zwei Nada Arakji.

translation.en: And for everyone who died trying to find a new life.
translation.de: Und für alle, die starben, als sie ein neues Leben suchten.

translation.en: Swim for them.
[man on PA] Swimming in lane three for Rwanda, Johanna Umurungi.
translation.de: Für Ruanda startet auf Bahn drei Johanna Umurungi.

translation.en: You're so much more than an Olympian.
translation.de: Du bist viel mehr als eine Olympionikin.

translation.en: [man on PA] Swimming in lane four for the Refugee Olympic Team,
translation.de: Für das Refugee Olympic Team startet auf Bahn vier

translation.en: [announcer] Take your marks.
-Yusra, go! -Faster!
Yeah!
-[sobbing] -Yusra!
Yeah! Yeah! [laughing]
-Are you racing me? -Are we racing?
Sara, please, I'm tired.
-No one's forcing you to race. -I hate you.
You love me! Kiss my Olympic ass.
translation.de: -Du liebst mich! -Leck mich an meinem Olympia-Arsch.

translation.en: I'm gonna kick your Olympic ass!
translation.de: Ich trete dir in deinen Olympia-Arsch!

translation.en: [laughing] No! No!
